segments.text: Let ’ s play a little game . I ’ ll describe someone and you try to guess who it is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I ’ m really bored at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . This man is tall and slim . He ’ s got blue eyes and curly brown hair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does he have a moustache or a beard ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good question . Yes , he has a moustache , but no beard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . You describe someone we both know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . She ’ s not very tall and she ’ s quite plump . She ’ s got blonder hair , but I don ’ t know what color her eyes are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is she attractive ? I don ’ t think I know anyone like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't find her attractive , but I'm sure you will disagree .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like slim girls , so I doubt I would find a plump girl attractive . You ’ ll have to give me some more information .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She ’ s got tiny feet and wears really unfashionable shoes . In fact , she wears unfashionable clothes too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This doesn ’ t sound like anyone I know . I give up . Teel me who she is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How embarrassing ! I don ’ t even recognize a description of my own mother ! How important do you think appearance is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that unfortunately it ’ s more important than a person ’ s character . Advertising and stuff tells us that we have to be attractive . I think it ’ s wrong , but that ’ s the way the world is now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m afraid you ’ re right . I chose my girlfriend because she has a wonderful personality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you certainly didn ’ t choose her because of her looks ! Hey , I was joking ! Don ’ t hit me !
segments.speaker: S2
